name: List
description: Collection display component with optional selection, orientation, and styling variants

accessibility.screenReader: Uses role=listbox with accessible label. Items use role=option. Selection mode announced via aria-multiselectable. Selected items announced with aria-selected. Orientation affects arrow key navigation direction.

recommendedUsage: Use for displaying collections of items with optional selection. Configure selection mode (single, multiple, none) based on use case. Use bordered variant for visual grouping.
antiPatterns: Do not use for navigation - use NavigationMenu or Breadcrumb. For complex data, use DataTable. Avoid using without proper labeling.
